content: chain yarn over and pull through loop on hook slip_stitch insert hook into stitch yarn over pull through stitch and loop on hook double_crochet double_crochet yarn over insert hook into stitch yarn over pull through stitch yarn over pull through two loops on hook yarn over pull through two loops on hook share your poncho with #prettypeacefulponcho on instagram tag me @prettypeacefulcrochet because i love to see your projects please feel free to sell finished items made from this pattern and give design credit as pretty peaceful poncho crochet pattern by pretty peaceful not for commercial use please do not share photos of this pattern only share the link to the pattern pdf on ravelry or youtube thank you for your support
